title: Minister Attaf receives the new Ghanaian and Iranian ambassadors accredited to Algeria
text: The Minister of Foreign Affairs and National Community Abroad, Mr. Ahmed Attaf, received, Tuesday, the new ambassador of the Republic of Ghana in Algeria, Yaw Sidney Bimpong, and the new ambassador of the Islamic Republic of Iran, Mohammad Reza Babaie, and handed him figurative copies of their credentials.

After welcoming them and wishing success in their missions, Mr. Attaf reviewed with the two new ambassadors the relations between Algeria and their respective countries and the prospects for their enhancement.
